views.markdown:
Version: 1.5.6 - Removed unnecessary bits Version: 1.5-4
- Fix preferences loading bug


Version: 1.5-3
- Revamped preferences page (Cephei)
- Now doesn't always require killing Camera app after settings changed
Version: 1.5-2
- Removed some unnecessary code
Version: 1.5-1
- Refactored code.
Version: 1.4-3
- Clean up and memory leaks fix.
Version: 1.4-2
- Updated for latest version of PhotoTorch tweak.
Version: 1.4-1
- Bugs fixed and improvement.
Version: 1.3-10
- Fix photo counter doesn't show up on iPad iOS 7.

Version: 1.3-9
- Instant Burst feature is now obsoleted. (iOS 7+)
Version: 1.3-8
- (iOS 8) Instant Burst option added.
- Bug fixed and improvement.

Version: 1.3-7
- Fix for preferences saving bug in iOS 8.
- Burst interval setting is now available for iOS 7 & 8 users.

Version: 1.3-6
- Full support for iOS 8.
- (iOS 8) "Analysis mode" option added.

Version: 1.3-5
- bugs fixed and improvement
- Fixed crash bug in iOS 7+ iPad.
Version: 1.3-4
- (iOS 7+) Added new option: "Torch Burst", use in conjuction with PhotoTorch tweak.

Version: 1.3-3
- Updated preferences panel in iOS 5 - 6.
- Fixed some preferences panel bug.
- Updated code for iOS 8.
Version: 1.3-2
- New option added: Single Counter.
- Minor bugs fixed.

Version: 1.3-1
- Fixed localization issue in iOS 5.x - 6.x (It's recommended to uninstall first before update to this version)
- Now compatible with iPhone 5s and above.
- Initial iOS 8 support.
Version: 1.2-2
- Bugs fixed.

Version: 1.2-1
- Option to disable capture sound during burst is now available.
Version: 1.1-16
- Updated code for iOS 7.1.x
Version: 1.1-15
- Performance improved. (Tested in iPod 5G 7.0.6)

Version: 1.1-14
- Fixed bug with Flash Burst and HDR Burst in some situation.
Version: 1.1-13
- New options added. (Faster Code and Disable Counter Animation) (iOS 7)
- Some bugs fixed. (iOS 7)
Version: 1.1-12
- Bring back the tweak settings for iOS 7, options available are
-> Toggle iPhone 5s Burst Mode feature
-> Adjust Photos Limit Count
-> Flash Burst
-> HDR Burst
-> No 999 Limit (Experimental)
- Fixed some minor issue with FrontFlash tweak.
Version: 1.1-8
- Fixed crashing in iPad running iOS 7
Version: 1.1-7
- Explanation for an issue with iPad running iOS 7 in Settings.
- Some bugs/UI fixed.

Version: 1.1-6
- Fixed a bug that causes a hook for iOS 7 not working.
- Fixed a bug for burst mode album.
- 64-bit Library included.
- Other bugs fixed.
Version: 1.1-3
- Added Support for iOS 7, enable the native Burst Mode feature in Camera app.
Version: 1.1-1
- Fixed bug in settings.
- Adjustment for initial properties.

Version: 1.0-5
- Decrease Hold Time Delay minimum to 0.1 s.
- Minor bug fixed and improvement.

Version: 1.0-4
- ADDED: Option to set burst photos count limit.
- ADDED: Button to hide keyboard that useful in iPhone/iPod when setting the option above.
- FIXED: Performance.
- FIXED: Some bugs.

Version: 1.0-3
- NOTE: iOS 7 is not supported. (It will be something else called "Burst Mode Enabler")
- FIXED: Performance and stability.

Version: 1.0-2
- FIXED: User cannot use volume button to toggle video recording.
- FIXED: Better burst mode overriding for volume button.
- FIXED: Icon naming problem.
